GeneDef.label: very slow gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have much slower gestation speeds than normal humans.\n\nFor obvious reasons, this doesn't usually have effects on males.

GeneDef.label: slow gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have slower gestation speeds than normal humans.\n\nFor obvious reasons, this doesn't usually have effects on males.

GeneDef.label: somewhat slow gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have some slower gestation speeds than normal humans.\n\nFor obvious reasons, this doesn't usually have effects on males.

GeneDef.label: somewhat fast gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have pregananies that are a little faster than normal.\n\nFor obvious reasons, this doesn't usually have effects on males.

GeneDef.label: fast gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have pregananies that are faster than normal.\n\nFor obvious reasons, this doesn't usually have effects on males.

GeneDef.label: very fast gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have pregananies that are a lot faster than normal.\n\nFor obvious reasons, this doesn't usually have effects on males.

GeneDef.label: extremely fast gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have pregananies that are extremely fast compared to normal.\n\nFor obvious reasons, this doesn't usually have effects on males.

GeneDef.label: super fast gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have pregananies that are super fast compared to normal.\n\nFor obvious reasons, this doesn't usually have effects on males.

GeneDef.label: hyper fast gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have pregananies that are unbelievably fast compared to normal.\n\nFor obvious reasons, this doesn't usually have effects on males.
